original_text:
In his tent dwells that which is none of his;
    sulfur is scattered over his habitation.
korean_text: 그에게 속하지 않은 자가 그의 장막에 거하리니 유황이 그의 처소에 뿌려질 것이며

sentences.original_text: In his tent dwells that which is none of his
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 장막에는 그의 것이 아닌 것이 거하며

sentences.original_text: sulfur is scattered over his habitation.
